attributes.review: Once I opened the app it started normal like most of the apps do. But when I get further in the app it was showing girls NAKED N.A.K.E.D  I’m so disappointed. The most horrible thing and trust me. My phone doesn’t have a virus it doesn’t do this on the other apps. This is such a disgrace. Oh ye, it said go check out the website pornhub LIKE BRUH. I THOUGHT THESE KIND OF APPS DOESNT HAVE ADS. PLEASE UPDATE THIS. IF YOUR SEEING THE PLEASE DO SOMETHING. Also, I want this app DELETED ASAP NOW!! Btw why are you deleting TikTok makes no sense you making your self in a worst situation. Are you dumb you think your making America great well your wrong, being so racist, trying to ban all Muslims, saying Mexicans are evil, saying black people don’t matter (basically). Like cmon man this isn’t cool what are we suppose to do without TikTok it’s like you forcing us to go out side. What are you gonna ban next is the US. Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat? This is outraged seeing you making America WORST than BETTER. This the longest review I’m literally taking my time I would be doing something else already. I would’ve not be stressing that TikTok is getting banned if it does... ima end my life. This is to much. Nvm I’m joking but why trump. Why you doing this. Ok so TikTok is taking our information and working with China but it’s fine, to me at least. I spent hours editing my TikTok videos. And now your making the time that I edit a waste of my life. I get likes, I get views. Even tho TikTok is stealing our information I. Still don’t with this app I CANT DO THIS ANYMORE. I HOPE THE APPLE STORE WILL DELETE THIS APP. For deleting TikTok. This is the consequences. If you can’t handle it well we don’t care. If you don’t car that this app gets deleted will you care if your not president anymore. I hope you change your mind about deleting this App, this is the only app everybody can pass time and not worrying what’s happening in their surroundings. I really hope this is a joke but if you do delete this app. There’s gonna be thousands of suicide confirm deaths. And other people will battle depression and anxiety and might commit suicide. Your making this world So bad for the people who live in the US. This is my message for you trump. Please change you mind about deleting this app.
